<url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;a4d6e591.1501">   <title>Follow our blog - This email list is now defunct </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;a4d6e591.1501</link>   <description> Dear Forest Ecology Group subscribers,<br><br>the JISCMAIL email list will no longer be used to share FEG news.<br>Instead, please Follow our blog at http://besfeg.wordpress.com<br>Why? Because blog articles are online and thus accessible to all and in perpetuity.<br><br>To follow (and thus receive email notification of updates), just click on the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdFollow\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd button on the bottom right of the blog page.<br>Attached is a screenshot highlighting the Follow button with a big red arrow. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-23T13:57:41+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, Dan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;a4d6e591.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;70ae8704.1412">   <title>Vote now in our poster competition </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;70ae8704.1412</link>   <description> The BES Forest Ecology Group Poster Competition is open now for voting.<br>Anyone signed up to the FEG jiscmail list can vote, and be entered into a prize draw to win one of three \ufffd\ufffd10 NHBS vouchers.<br>Please go to<br>https://besfeg.wordpress.com/poster-competition-entries/<br>to view the posters and vote for your three favourites.<br>Prizewinners will be announced Wednesday evening at the FEG Social.<br>For those attending the Annual Meeting, we will meet at 7.15 at the registration desks. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-09T14:10:55+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, Dan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;70ae8704.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;95866dac.1412">   <title>First entry in the FEG poster competition </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;95866dac.1412</link>   <description> https://besfeg.wordpress.com/2014/12/02/first-entry-to-feg-poster-competition-is-in/<br><br>Please subscribe to our blog at http://besfeg.wordpress.com<br><br>This email list will be closed in the New Year.<br>You can unsubscribe from the list at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/FORESTECOLOGYGROUP<br><br>Yours,<br>Dan<br><br>Dr Dan Bebber<br>Senior Research Fellow<br>Biosciences<br>University of Exeter    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-02T17:50:26+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, Dan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;95866dac.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;96287ede.1411</link>   <description> For those presenting a forest ecology poster at Lille, our prizes are announced...<br>https://besfeg.wordpress.com/2014/11/25/poster-competition-prizes-announced/<br><br>Please follow our blog at http://besfeg.wordpress.com because this email list will be discontinued in the New Year.<br><br>Dr Dan Bebber<br>Senior Research Fellow<br>Biosciences<br>University of Exeter    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-25T12:57:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;8e6a7300.1411</link>   <description> http://besfeg.wordpress.com/2014/11/11/forest-carbon-dynamics-the-best-session-at-lille/<br><br>Please follow our blog updates at http://besfeg.wordpress.com by clicking on ‘Follow’ at the bottom right of the page.<br>This JISCMAIL mailing list will be phased out over the coming year.<br><br>Dan<br><br>Dr Dan Bebber<br>(Secretary, BES Forest Ecology Group)<br>Senior Research Fellow<br>Biosciences<br>University of Exeter    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-13T10:51:27+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, Dan</dc:creator> your Annual Meeting poster for a chance to win prizes!<br><br>Dan    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-05T14:24:55+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, Dan</dc:creator> <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;3511ac12.1410</link>   <description> https://besfeg.wordpress.com/2014/10/20/phd-studentships-at-university-of-alberta-canada/<br><br>Please sign up for updates to the BES Forest Ecology Blog by going to http://besfeg.wordpress.com and clicking the ‘follow’ button that appears either on the Wordpress toolbar (if you are logged in to Wordpress), or on the bottom right of the page.<br><br>Dan<br><br>Dr Dan Bebber<br>Senior Research Fellow<br>Biosciences<br>University of Exeter    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-20T13:37:59+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, Dan</dc:creator> <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;ae42bd9a.1410</link>   <description> Dining on Forest Food: Lessons from the Tropics<br>by Emma Pilgrim, Exeter University<br><br>http://besfeg.wordpress.com/2014/10/08/dining-on-forest-food-lesson-from-the-tropics/<br><br>Please sign up for blog updates on the homepage http://besfeg.wordpress.com/<br><br>Dan<br><br>Dr Dan Bebber (FEG Secretary)<br>Senior Research Fellow<br>Biosciences<br>University of Exeter    </description> https://besfeg.wordpress.com/2014/09/19/funding-for-your-forest-ecology-meetings-and-activities-deadline-1st-october/    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-19T15:27:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, Dan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;528db835.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;7c49c9e9.1409">   <title>BES Annual Meeting, FEG Session </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;7c49c9e9.1409</link>   <description> Dear subscribers,<br><br>we have the opportunity to run an FEG session at the upcoming BES Annual Meeting in Lille, this December.<br>For details, please read the blog:<br>http://besfeg.wordpress.com/2014/09/05/abstract-submission-deadline-for-joint-2014-annual-meeting-is-15th-september/<br><br>Best wishes,<br>Dan Bebber    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-05T03:13:09+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, Dan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;7c49c9e9.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;4a381a2c.1405">   <title>Blog update </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;4a381a2c.1405</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>The blog (http://besfeg.wordpress.com/) has just been updated with an article on 300 million hectares of missing forests, and some courses from Oxford University.<br>http://besfeg.wordpress.com/2014/05/19/chinas-missing-forests/<br>http://besfeg.wordpress.com/2014/05/19/courses-from-oxford-university-department-for-continuing-education/<br><br>Please do send me your news, announcements, jobs, studentships, meetings, press releases, Forest of the Month, to share with the Forest Ecology community in the UK and around the world. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-20T10:00:54+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, Dan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;4a381a2c.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;f359c81.1404">   <title>How to follow a blog </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;f359c81.1404</link>   <description> Dear all,<br>this guide may be helpful if you haven’t followed a blog before\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>http://en.support.wordpress.com/following/<br><br>Dan    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-30T18:23:28+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, Dan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;f359c81.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;5eafe268.1404">   <title>New FEG blog </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;5eafe268.1404</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>the Forest Ecology Group now has a blog (http://besfeg.wordpress.com/) which will be the central repository of news and information, and is replacing the previous Bulletin.<br>Please subscribe to the blog to receive updates about new posts.<br>As always, please send me your news about Meetings, Publications, Jobs, Studentships, and other forest-related activities and I will post them straight away.<br>Forest of the Month (with photo) and Field Station recommendations very welcome, as always. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-30T18:06:00+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bebber, Dan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=FORESTECOLOGYGROUP;5eafe268.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
